name: Lapse - Game Concept Prototype
description:
This is a concept prototype of Lapse. 

The prototype shows core mechanics of the game which are 

1.  First person perspective movement

2. collecting objects

3. Inventory

4. Interact with objects

5. Unlock door

6. Inspect objects

Controls

Action

Keyboard+Mouse

Movement

W, A, S, D

Look and Turn

Mouse

Crouch 

Control [CTRL]

Open Inventory

TAB

Interact with an object/ Picking an object

Left Mouse Click

Inspect an object/use key objects with an object

Right Mouse Click

Zoom in

Mouse Wheel Click
